s0600: Later scholar who loved affairs Mr. Chu said: The Grand Historian recorded events ending with Emperor Wu's affairs, therefore again compiled records of meritorious ministers and marquises from Emperor Zhao onward, arranged on the left, so that later scholars who love affairs may view the successes and failures, lengths and shortness of severed generations, and may warn themselves thereby.
s0601: The gentlemen of the present age, exercising authority adapting to change, measuring time applying what is suitable, rarely using affairs to establish merit and obtain land enfeoffed as marquises, establishing names in the present age - is this not flourishing!
s0602: Observe their way of holding fullness guarding completion, all are not modest yielding, arrogant contentious for power, fond of proclaiming reputation, know advance not retreat, in the end kill body extinguish state.
s0603: With three obtained it, and in person lost it, cannot transmit merit to later generations, cause beneficence to flow to descendants - is this not sad!
s0604: Marquis Longluo once served as Forward General, worldly compliant good, substantial heavy careful trustworthy, did not participate in political affairs, retired yielding loved people.
s0605: His ancestors arose in the generation of the six ministers of Jin.
s0606: Since having land ruling state, being kings and marquises, descendants successively inherited not broken, through years through generations, up to now, altogether over hundred years - how can this be spoken of on the same day as meritorious ministers who lost it in person?
s0607: Alas, later generations should be warned by this!
